price: (Yaa Muhammad!) Rabbiin dhiifama siif godhee,(lola irraa hafuu) maalif isaaniif hayyamte? hanga isaan dhugaa dubbatan ifa siif ta’anii warra soban beektutti.
arabic: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَتَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ʿafā al-lahu ʿanka lima adhinta lahum ḥattā yatabayyana laka alladhīna ṣadaqū wataʿlama al-kādhibīna
